container-title: As in the case of the U.S
title: U.S. Treasury Secretary Henry Morgenthau proposed via memorandum a “United Nations Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Financier and Washington Post publisher who only served six months as President
Lawyer, banker, and member of the U.S. foreign policy establishment
Financier who served a very long term. During his tenure, the Bank became known as “Black’s Bank
Financier who brought the Bank into the modern era, particularly with an increased use of economic analysis
Industrialist and controversial U.S. Secretary of Defense during the Vietnam War who was responsible for a major reorganization and for a focus on policy-based lending

note: the Bank’s subscription capital more than doubled to US$21 billion and currently stands at approximately US$275 billion.8 In 1956, the IBRD Executive Directors created the International Finance Corporation
title: The first set of loans went to France, the Netherlands, Denmark, and Luxembourg. These loans were funded by the United States and were used primarily to purchase U.S. exports. The tilt toward reconstruction was soon offset by the introduction of the U.S. Marshall Plan and European Recovery Program, which surpassed the resources of the World Bank and IMF.7 Subsequent to these programs, the IBRD made loans to Chile, Mexico, and Brazil. The Bank’s first bond issue in 1947 quickly traded at a premium over the offer price. The IBRD was on its way to a respectable position in U.S. and world capital markets

container-title: 1960, the Executive Directors followed up by creating the International Development Association (IDA). These two organizations became the second and third components of the World Bank Group
title: This action followed nearly five years of discussion

container-title: 1973, Mason and Asher stated that “the IBRD has not . . . paid enough attention to the ecological or environmental effects of the projects it has financed”
title: Let’s consider some of these opposing critiques, beginning with the environment

note: launched an attack on the World Bank supported Polonoroeste project in Brazil. The term Polonoroeste stands for 25 See chapter 6 of Phillips (2009). Structural adjustment lending was renamed development policy loans (DPL).
title: In retrospect, this was a prophetic statement. The environmental issue rose to the surface 10 years later. Bruce Rich, then an attorney with the Natural Resources Defense Council (later with the Environmental Defense Fund

Europe but quickly became a lender to developing countries in support of development projects and structural adjustment. The World Bank actually consists of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association

container-title: the International Finance Corporation, the International Center for Settlement of Investment Disputes, and the Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency
title: A collection of five organizations: the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development, the International Development Association

The WTO was established in 1995 as part of the Marrakesh Agreement ending the Uruguay Round of trade talks. It is an international organization with a legal foundation for managing world trading relationships
